title: Understanding Hypnotics
text: Hypnotics are a type of medication. They are often used to address issues related to sleep.

title: Purpose of Hypnotics
text: Consider what these medications are primarily used for. They are not typically used for mood stabilization or anxiety management.

hintAnswer: a class of medications that help clients fall and stay asleep
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes hypnotics?
choices: a $$first-line$$ choice in the management of mania and mixed mania, and with bipolar maintenance

increased heart rate, elevated blood pressure, rapid breathing, tensed muscles, sweating, digestive issues (nausea, diarrhea, or constipation), weakened immune system, and insomnia or sleep disturbances
a class of medications that help clients fall and stay asleep
a heightened state of arousal and worry that may not always have a clear external cause
